title: Food

images.alt: A plate of bread with cheese and a glass of milk
images.altNl: Een bord brood met kaas en een glas melk
images.label: Eva

questionNl: Vertel wat je ziet. Vind je dit lekker?
questionEn: Tell what you see. Do you like this?

selfAssessmentCriteria.text: I said what I see in the picture
selfAssessmentCriteria.textEn: I said what I see in the picture

selfAssessmentCriteria.text: I said if I like the food or not
selfAssessmentCriteria.textEn: I said if I like the food or not

modelAnswer.transcript: I see bread with cheese. There is also a glass of milk. I like bread with cheese. I eat it every morning.
modelAnswer.transcriptNl: Ik zie brood met kaas. Er is ook een glas melk. Ik vind brood met kaas lekker. Ik eet het elke ochtend.

tips: First say what you see, then say if you like it.
Use simple words like 'lekker' (tasty) or 'niet lekker' (not tasty).
You can add one sentence about yourself, like 'I eat this every day.'
